title: dominiclim.dev
description: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Astro, React, and TypeScript. Features smooth animations, dark mode support, and an infinite scrolling certification carousel.

title: KineGit
description: A fictional gym website called 'KineGit' that allows people to register and start booking classes!

title: OCBC Virtual Teller Machine
description: An end-to-end Virtual Teller Machine (VTM) prototype built for the OCBC Ignite Innovation Challenge 2025.
